authorCredential.translatedString: Former intern at the Danish Parliament.
authorCredential.description: Former intern at the Danish Parliament.

question.title: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "What is racist, but is often regarded as not racist?", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}

answer.content: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "", "modifiers": {"image": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-ae57027c09f1834c5d451cd9d9e2c4c4", "height": 400, "width": 800, "master_url": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-9fce7367a08f13f44b49c87457eae90b-c", "zoomable": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "image", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Accusing my ancestors of slavery. ", "modifiers": {"bold": true}}, {"text": "Yes, I\u2019m white. No, my ancestors didn\u2019t own slaves. Just because you are white doesn\u2019t mean that your ancestors owned slaves.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "ordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Saying being white is easy.", "modifiers": {"bold": true}}, {"text": " One of my white friends was raped, beaten by her father and tried to kill herself numerous times. Being white doesn\u2019t mean you\u2019re guaranteed a good life.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "ordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Affirmative action.", "modifiers": {"bold": true}}, {"text": " It\u2019s not reverse racism. It\u2019s racism. When I discovered that people actually defended a system which discriminated against people because of their ethnicity, I was surprised. I thought it was only the KKK that would do that.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "ordered-list", "is_rtl": false}]}
